name: Shelmet

conditions.value: while in the presence of a Karrablast

description: The Snail Pokémon. It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by negative status ailments in water or during rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to extra damage dealt by a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather-related moves and phenomena like Hail, Weather Ball, etc.
